column3: This should probably be checking for connections to at least two netgroups outside of RFC1918 IP space, but this is certainly an improvement.\n

@pstratem checking connections is better than no check at all.  This PR is from April 2015, so I'm not inclined to expand the scope any further right now. If this is accepted I'll happily open a follow on PR to make it stronger.\n
Can one of the admins verify this patch?\n
Running a public node with #7960 #8007 #8065 #8080 #8082 #8084 #8086 for testing.\n
This should be easy to test manually: add a debug log entry above the info.nAttempts increment in CAddrMan::Attempt_(), and see how often it triggers with network connected and disconnected.\n
